We are performance testing an application with the following flow
1. Login
2. Home Page (Uses session data which is stored in cookies)
3. Logout
We have added a HTTP Cookie Manager with 'clear cookies on each iteration' option checked

With a single user it works fine. When we run the test with 2 users for 5 mins duration with a ramp up of 2 seconds, it throws application error (Null Pointer Exception). Application is saying that session data is missing. Following scenario (based on assumption) is our suspect.

        1. User1 logs in
        2. User2 logs in
        3. User 1 & User 2 uses cookies, for session data, in parallel
        4. User1 logs out
        5. Jmeter clears the cookies
        6. User2 tries to use cookies 
        7. Application throws Null Pointer Exception (this is the exception received at application end)

Do we have any work around for this issue? 

Kindly help. We are running out of time to complete the performance testing activity

Regards
